Html:
Hi I just noticed that the optimuim spell rotation in the optimizer is a way out:

1) SWP does not need to be refreshed every 20 sec (MF will do it)

2) Haste is not calculated in MB timing (8 sec.)  my haste I used for optimization brings MB CD to 6.5 sec

3) Same haste issue with DP.

4) As mentioned VE gets another tick when haste is higher.

Right now the roation is so far from being correct, I doubt that it's results are useful.

This is such a wonderful tool and so well crafted that it would be great if we could get a Shadow Priest developer to correct these big errors.
